Name: forum_scraped.set-with-if-right-left-len_1
Input:
Set(
    With(
        {varText: "1;test1;no;yes|2;test2;no;yes|3;test3;yes;yes|4;test4;no;no|"},
        If(Right(varText,1)="|",
        Left(varText, Len(varText-1)),
        varText
    )
)
Expected:
Set(
    With(
        {varText: "1;test1;no;yes|2;test2;no;yes|3;test3;yes;yes|4;test4;no;no|"},
        If(Right(varText,1)="|",
        Left(varText, Len(varText-1)))),
        varText
    )

Name: forum_scraped.switch-clearcollect
Input:
With{
   {
      wDays:
      Switch(
         AdminScreen_CO_Desks_DateFilter.Selected.Value,
         "All",
         1,
         "Today",
         0,
         "Next 2 Days",
         2,
         "Next 7 Days"
         7,
         "Next 30 Days"
         30
      )
   },
   ClearCollect(
      BookingLogCollect,
      Filter(
         BookingLog
         DateDiff(
            Today(),
            StartingDate
         )<=wDays
      )
   )
)
Expected:
With(
   {
      wDays:
      Switch(
         AdminScreen_CO_Desks_DateFilter.Selected.Value,
         "All",
         1,
         "Today",
         0,
         "Next 2 Days",
         2,
         "Next 7 Days"
         ,7,
         "Next 30 Days"
         ,30
      )
   },
   ClearCollect(
      BookingLogCollect,
      Filter(
         BookingLog
         ,DateDiff(
            Today(),
            StartingDate
         )<=wDays
      )
   )
)

forum_scraped.with-set
forum_scraped.with-text
Input:
With(
   {
      wYear:Text(Year(Now()),
      wNext:Text(Year(Now()+1),
      wSelected:DataCardValue29_1.Selected.Value,
      wDate:DateValue("01June" & Year(Now())>=Today(),
   },
   Switch(
      wSelected,
      "Test1",
      If(
         wDate,
         DateValue("30June" & wYear),
         DateValue("30June" & wNext)
      ),
	  "Test2"
      If( 
         wDate,
         DateValue("30October" & wYear),
         DateValue("30October" & wNext)
      )
   )
)
Expected:
With(
   {
      wYear:Text(Year(Now()),
      wNext,Text(Year(Now()+1),
      wSelected,DataCardValue29_1.Selected.Value)),
      wDate:DateValue("01June" & Year(Now())>=Today()
   )},
   Switch(
      wSelected,
      "Test1",
      If(
         wDate,
         DateValue("30June" & wYear),
         DateValue("30June" & wNext)
      ),
	  "Test2"
      ,If( 
         wDate,
         DateValue("30October" & wYear),
         DateValue("30October" & wNext)
      )
   )
)
